body:
Dear Taylor,






In Daysim under the Building Tab you select under Shading Device either
'static shading device (included in geometry)' or your pick one of the
two dynamic blind option. The first case is equivalent to 'no blinds'.






Christoph
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2010-April/006726.html).</sup>
